meanings.sent1: The teacher preapproves all field trip requests.
meanings.sent2: The manager preapproves all expenses before they are incurred.
meanings.sent3: The cat preapproves any new toys before playing with them.
meanings.sent4: The chef preapproves all ingredients before using them in the recipe.
meanings.sent5: The editor preapproves all articles before they are published.

meanings.definition: To give approval before something is done.
meanings.sent1: The committee preapproves all budget allocations.
meanings.sent2: The supervisor preapproves all time-off requests.
meanings.sent3: The dog preapproves any visitors before they enter the house.
meanings.sent4: The judge preapproves all plea deals before accepting them.
meanings.sent5: The parent preapproves all movie choices before family movie night.
